name: dsw
description: Dynamic Service Worker, offline Progressive Web Apps much easier

scripts.test: echo ':: Running tests:' && mocha tests/ --compilers js:babel-core/register
scripts.lint: echo ':: Linting the source files:' && eslint --ignore-pattern manifest-model.json --quiet src/** && echo 'Done linting'
scripts.docs: echo ':: Generating documentation:' && docco -m -o docs/ docs/config-example.js && gh-pages -d docs
scripts.build: npm run lint && browserify src/main.js -o dist/dsw.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && echo 'Done building'
scripts.try: echo ':: Trying the sandbox sample ::' && node ./bin/index.js sandbox --verbose && http-server ./sandbox -p 8888

author: felipenmoura
